None.Name: Tainted Infiltration
None.Description: Activate to teleport the unit to a hostile structure within a 50m range. Cards can no longer be played out next to it once the unit has been teleported. At its new position it will explode after 10 seconds dealing 170 damage to hostile units in a 20m radius, up to 510 in total. Knocks back small units.
